text: “(Awo amene alonjezedwa kupeza izi, ndi) omwe amalapa (akalakwa); ochita mapemphero (awo m’njira yoyenera); otamanda Allah kwambiri; ochulukitsa kusala (Swaumu kapena oyendayenda padziko ncholinga chochitira zabwino anthu), owerama, ogwetsa nkhope zawo pansi; olamula zabwino; oletsa zoipa ndi osunga malire a Allah (malamulo Ake). Choncho, auze nkhani yabwino awo amene akhulupirira
